sequence: It's much colder down this end of the corridor. Air conditioning maybe.
Some years ago you heard a straight couple having sex. You were on the street and they were on the 2nd floor.
They had left their window open. It was a quiet summer evening. They were very loud.
Ever since then you sometimes imagine you hear them again, but it is always just the TV, or something else.
The door knob is a few inches above where it should be. You can see the bare wood where the old handle was.
You will never be as beautiful as the people behind this door.
There is a newborn baby somewhere on this hall.
You hear it crying more nights than not. It doesn't bother you, but it is loud.
Someties it sounds awful, like you think something terrible could be happening to it. You consider calling the police.
Why didn't you cry like that when your tooth was hurting so terribly? What changed?
Very occasionally you will, around 8am, hear a door buzzer. It goes on for a long time.
Then, sometimes, you hear knocking and raised voices.
You remember that your father calls your brother every day to make sure he gets up for work.
